Text: Fwd Pablo Acevedos referencesKen In addition to the mail I sent you before just wanted to remind you that my granfather was George Bushs and Mr Doyle Mices partner in Mandrell Industries now Zapata Off Shore years ago Regards to you and your family Pablo XMozillaStatus MessageID DispositionNotificationTo pablo acevedo Date Sat Sep From pablo acevedo XMailer Mozilla en WinNT I XAcceptLanguage en MIMEVersion To Subject Pablo Acevedos references ContentType multipartmixed boundaryBFDBDB Dear Ken I am a friend of your daugther Elizabeth while she was in Argentina and I am applying for a job with Eli Lilly in Indianapolis as a Latin American Development Manager I would like to know if there is a posibility to have a recomendation letter from you since I know you are from the Board of Directos from Lilly I have worked for Enron South America in Argentina and Brazil and currently runing mu own company If you believe this is possible just let me know I am attaching my cv to you Many thanks Ken Sincerely Pablo Acevedo cvpadoc

Pablo Acevedos referencesDear Ken I am a friend of your daugther Elizabeth while she was in Argentina and I am applying for a job with Eli Lilly in Indianapolis as a Latin American Development Manager I would like to know if there is a posibility to have a recomendation letter from you since I know you are from the Board of Directos from Lilly I have worked for Enron South America in Argentina and Brazil and currently runing mu own company If you believe this is possible just let me know I am attaching my cv to you Many thanks Ken Sincerely Pablo Acevedo cvpadoc
greetingsDear Ken Merry Christmas and happy New Year to you and your family My special regards to you daughter Elizabeth Best regards Pablo Acevedo

cv attachedDear Rosalee Please forward to Ken thanks I am attaching my cv for you to have handy If you are restructuring Enron in the US and overseas let me know if I can give you a hand on the international side Fyi I am currently working as a consultant for the Bunge Corp and Bunge International an agribusiness company that went public this year in the US stock symbol is BG Regards and have a great holiday season Pablo Acevedo cvpadoc
hi mitePST Hi Scott Are you now the CEO of the new Enron If not when Send me your home email adress again please since my laptop collapsed recently Un abrazo Pablo
soy bean grower storyare you still growing trees at your farm hope you enjoy this story saludos Pablo PS Hope we can work out something with the Agguys what do you think Bizweek APRIL doc
no subjectHi Scottie What in the world is happening with the big E what a nice messi have been following events lately Let me know your opinion about Enron Te mando un abrazo Pablo
hiScott I am forwarding my companys exec summary and my cv as well si if you see anything interesting over there let me know Good talking to you Regards Pablo Cell Home cvpadoc xcdtsexec summarydoc

Re references Pablo Acevedook Greg As I told you I am looking forward to hear from you at your convenience in case you have any interest in developing some new energy business in Latin America Best regards Pablo wrote Return Receipt Your references Pablo Acevedo document was Greg nronXgate received by at PM This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

references Pablo AcevedoDear Greg I have worked for Enron South America for years and currenty running my own company called Xcedentescom Also I spent a great deal of my time at Enron Houston and know a lot of people that can bring real value to the table In case I can be of any assistance at any time do not hesitate to reach me For references you can check with the following people in Houston Scott Neal East gas Desk trading Ted Noble Financial Trading Elsa Piekelniek Darren Maloney Good luck with your new position Regards Pablo Acevedo cvpadoc
